#Text= Tenzin says : " You must be at the end of your rope .

column1: #Text=You hate meditating .
#Text=" Korra says : " I thought if I really tried I might be able to contact my past Avatars , someone who knows something to help me , but I ca n't .
#Text=They 're gone and I 'm all alone .
#Text=Did I ruin everything by leaving the spirit portals open ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You did n't ruin anything .
#Text=You did what you thought was best for the world , and now things have changed .
#Text=Change can be good or bad , depending on your point of view .
#Text=" Korra says : " I know the people 's point of view .
#Text=It 's bad .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You 're not the President , Korra .
#Text=Your job is n't to fix the daily problems of every person in Republic City .
#Text=Your responsibility is to bring balance to the entire world , and that means no matter what you do , some people are not going to be happy about it .
#Text=" Korra says : " Right .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " On the other hand , some people will be very happy .
#Text=Like me .
#Text=What you did during Harmonic Convergence may have brought back the Air Nation , and that can only be good for restoring balance .
#Text=That is the act of a great Avatar .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's scary .
#Text=I have all this power and all these people depending on me , but I do n't know what I am supposed to be doing half the time .
#Text=It seems like I should be ... wiser .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " True wisdom begins when we accept things as they are .
#Text=You 've started a new age , Korra .
#Text=There 's no going back to the past .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Mako called !
#Text=The cops found a new airbender guy , but when they tried to bring him in , he ran away and climbed to the top of Kyoshi Bridge and wo n't come down .
#Text=Ooh sorry , did I interrupt an Avatar wisdom session ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Avatar wisdom is the thing of the past , Bolin .
#Text=Come on .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh okay .
#Text=Is that a good thing ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Depends who you ask .
#Text="
